title: Mastery 7 token
body: I earned an S- playing morg just before but didn't receive a token, do you have to earn S or S+ to get a mastery 7 token?

replies.body:
You only receive mastery 7 tokens for S and S+ ranks. You also need 3 tokens to unlock the mastery (and an extra 100 blue essence over the M6 requirement if that's how you plan to upgrade). 

Good luck :)

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=An3A2ygt,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-27T02:44:50.869+0000)
>
> You only receive mastery 7 tokens for S and S+ ranks. You also need 3 tokens to unlock the mastery (and an extra 100 blue essence over the M6 requirement if that's how you plan to upgrade). 
> 
> Good luck :)

Thanks Sera's Dragon. Maybe I should just read the entire article before jumping to the boards lol
It's all good friend :) We're here to help
